FINDREDUNDANTDEPS(1) General Commands Manual FINDREDUNDANTDEPS(1)

NAME

findredundantdeps — find (un)necessary dependencies of a package source

SYNOPSIS

findredundantdeps [-huv] pkgname

DESCRIPTION

The findredundantdeps utility prints the full recursive dependencies of a given package displaying the dependencies that are already contained in the depending package. findredundantdeps operates on package source in the pkgsrc tree and requires pkgman(1).

The options are as follows:

-u, --unique
Sort and display only unique (required) packages.
-v, --version
Print version and exit.
-h, --help
Print help and exit.

SEE ALSO

finddepsdistmeta(1), finddepslinked(1), finddisappeared(1), finddisowned(1)
